title: Getting Started
excerpt: To start building your custom Collection, including previewing material that
content:
Instructors

To start building your custom Collection, including previewing material that you may be considering for adoption, please sign in and follow the instructions to create your own custom textbook.

Don't have an account?

No problem, you can create one from the sign in screen.

Students

Are you looking to access a published Collection? You will need a join link from your instructor. Please follow the link to access the Collection for your course.
